resources.string: This is a game developed by Mariyan Donev. The name of the game is Block Out. Mariyan Donev is second year Computer Science student in University of Reading. The game is a basic game of breaking bricks with a ball. The original game is developed and published by Atari.inc. It was conceptualized by Nolan Bushnell and Steve Bristow, influenced by the 1972 Atari arcade game pong and built by Steve Wozniak.
